Package game.enemies

package game.enemies
  • Related Packages

    Description
    game
     
  • Class
    Description
    AoECapable
    An interface that defines an object that is able to perform aoe attacks and actions
    Dog
    an enemy representing a dog in Stormveil castle Created by:
    Enemy
     
    EnemyFactory
    A factory for enemies, allows us to abstract the responsibility of creating enemies into a seperate class
    GiantCrab
    An enemy that represents a Giant crab spawns from puddle of water on the west side of the map and is capable of performing a slam attack won't attack other crustaceans
    GiantCrayfish
    An enemy that represents a Giant crayfish spawns from puddle of water on the east side of the map and is capable of performing a slam attack won't attack other crustaceans
    GiantDog
    An enemy that represents a Giant dog spawns from gust of wind on the east side of the map and is capable of performing a slam attack won't attack other canines
    GiantEnemy
    A class of enemies that implement aoe capable and can perform slam attacks with their giant bodies
    GodrickSoldier
    An enemy reprsenting a Godrick solder from Stormveil castle Created by:
    GodrickTheGrafted
    An enemy representing the boss Godrick the Grafted, 2 phase fight that triggers when enemy reaches half hp Created by:
    HeavySkeletalSwordsman
    An enemy that represents a Heavy skeletal swordsman spawns from graveyard on the west side of the map and is capable of performing a spinning attack with its grossmesser won't attack other skeletons
    LoneWolf
    BEHOLD, DOG! Enemy that represents a Lone wolf spawns from gust of wind on the west side of the map won't attack other canines
    PileOfBones
    An enemy that represents a Pile of bones spawned by skeletal enemies on death, does nothing for 3 turns before reviving into a new skeletal enemy
    SkeletalEnemy
    A class of enemies who turn into a pile of bones on death before reviving Also implements AoECapable to perform their spinning attack
    SkeletonBandit
    An enemy that represents a Skeletal bandit spawns from graveyard on the west east of the map and is capable of performing a spinning attack with its scimitar won't attack other skeletons
